description: ACM V11.4 Operations Dashboard - Health, Regimes, Anomalies, Episodes, and RUL

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1 HealthIndex
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT TOP 1 HealthZone
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

panels.description: Remaining Useful Life estimate in hours

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1 ROUND(RUL_Hours, 1) AS RUL
FROM ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND (P10_LowerBound IS NOT NULL OR P50_Median IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

panels.title: RUL Estimate

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1 Confidence
FROM ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

panels.description: Total anomaly episodes in time range

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Episodes
FROM ACM_Episodes
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND StartTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()

panels.title: Total Episodes

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS ActiveDefects
FROM ACM_SensorDefects
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND ActiveDefect = '1'
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM ACM_SensorDefects WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY ID DESC)

SELECT TOP 1 ROUND(fused, 2) AS FusedZ
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    HealthIndex AS value,
    'Health Index' AS metric
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY Timestamp ASC

SELECT TOP 1
    ROUND(RUL_Hours, 1) AS RUL_Hours,
    ROUND(P10_LowerBound, 1) AS P10_Lower,
    ROUND(P50_Median, 1) AS P50_Median,
    ROUND(P90_UpperBound, 1) AS P90_Upper,
    ROUND(Confidence, 3) AS Confidence,
    Method,
    RUL_Status,
    MaturityState,
    TopSensor1,
    TopSensor2,
    TopSensor3
FROM ACM_RUL
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND (P10_LowerBound IS NOT NULL OR P50_Median IS NOT NULL)
ORDER BY CreatedAt DESC

SELECT 
    Timestamp,
    RegimeLabel,
    AssignmentConfidence
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY Timestamp ASC

panels.description: Distribution of time spent in each operating regime

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    'Regime ' + CAST(RegimeLabel AS VARCHAR) AS metric,
    COUNT(*) AS value
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY RegimeLabel
ORDER BY value DESC

panels.title: Regime Distribution

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 1 RegimeLabel
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT TOP 1 AssignmentConfidence
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT TOP 1 CAST(COALESCE(IsNovel, 0) AS INT) AS IsNovel
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC

SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    AssignmentConfidence AS value,
    'Confidence' AS metric
FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY Timestamp ASC

panels.description: Fused anomaly score over time with thresholds

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    fused AS value,
    'Fused Z' AS metric
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY Timestamp ASC

panels.title: Fused Anomaly Score

panels.description: Individual detector scores over time (AR1, PCA-SPE, PCA-T2)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    ar1_z AS value,
    'AR1' AS metric
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    pca_spe_z AS value,
    'PCA-SPE' AS metric
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    pca_t2_z AS value,
    'PCA-T2' AS metric
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Detector Scores (AR1, PCA)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    iforest_z AS value,
    'IForest' AS metric
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    gmm_z AS value,
    'GMM' AS metric
FROM ACM_Scores_Wide
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT TOP 30
    EpisodeID,
    StartTime,
    ROUND(COALESCE(DurationHours, DurationSeconds / 3600.0, 0), 2) AS DurHrs,
    Severity,
    PrimaryDetector AS Detector,
    RegimeLabel AS Regime,
    Culprits
FROM ACM_Episodes
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND StartTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY StartTime DESC

SELECT 
    DetectorType,
    Severity,
    ViolationCount,
    ROUND(ViolationPct, 2) AS ViolationPct,
    ROUND(MaxZ, 2) AS MaxZ,
    ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) AS CurrentZ,
    ActiveDefect
FROM ACM_SensorDefects
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM ACM_SensorDefects WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY ID DESC)
ORDER BY ViolationPct DESC

SELECT 
    Severity AS metric,
    COUNT(*) AS value
FROM ACM_Episodes
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND StartTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY Severity
ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT 
    COALESCE(PrimaryDetector, 'Unknown') AS metric,
    COUNT(*) AS value
FROM ACM_Episodes
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND StartTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY PrimaryDetector
ORDER BY value DESC

panels.description: Top sensor hotspots with highest Z-scores

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 10
    SensorName,
    ROUND(MaxAbsZ, 2) AS MaxAbsZ,
    ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) AS LatestAbsZ,
    AboveAlertCount AS AlertCount,
    AboveWarnCount AS WarnCount
FROM ACM_SensorHotspots
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND RunID = (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY ID DESC)
ORDER BY MaxAbsZ DESC

panels.title: Top Sensor Hotspots

list.definition: SELECT EquipCode AS __text, EquipID AS __value FROM Equipment WHERE EquipID IN (SELECT DISTINCT EquipID FROM ACM_HealthTimeline) ORDER BY EquipCode
list.label: Equipment
list.name: equipment
list.query: SELECT EquipCode AS __text, EquipID AS __value FROM Equipment WHERE EquipID IN (SELECT DISTINCT EquipID FROM ACM_HealthTimeline) ORDER BY EquipCode

title: ACM V11.4 - Operations
